q1: For how much longer do you think Lionel Messi will play for the national team?
a1: I don't think Messi will play with the Argentine national team any longer.
q3: If the World Cup would be in Argentina would they have a good chance to win it?
a3: Maybe. The home fans would make them play better.
q4: I share my opinion on this, it would be a strong wave of help for him.
a4: I think Argentina would be under more pressure being at home, and therefore it would be more difficult for them to win the World Cup at home.
q5: Is Argentina cohesive with good teamwork?
a5: Not really. They have great talent but everyone plays as an individual.
